entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.5.0
entry.content:
[NEW] CHECK_UPDATE_STOPPED_CONTAINERS environment variable to determine if check updates for stopped containers. By default to 1. (0 no, 1 yes) [NEW] Improve local development (auto-reload after saving changes) by @esdedev [NEW] Updated internal Libraries [NEW] The prune function exits the experimental phase. It should continue to be used wisely. [FIX] Now if the bot is muted won't notify updates

What's Changed

  • Refactor Docker setup and update .gitignore to improve local development by @esdedev in https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/pull/58

New Contributors

  • @esdedev made their first contribution in https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/pull/58

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.4.0...v3.5.0

entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v3.6.0
entry.content:
[NEW] Pruning now shows the space reclaimed [NEW] GROUPED_UPDATES variable to show all updates together [NEW] /updateall command to update all available containers [FIX] Optimised docker image creation reducing space taken [FIX] Updated alpine base to fix vulnerabilities

What's Changed

  • prune actions shows the space reclaimed in the system by @0neTX in https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/pull/63

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v3.5.1...v3.6.0
